alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 12 at 4:08PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is possible. * WHERE...Including the following area, Central Interior. This includes the cities of Nenana, Tanana, Manley Hot Springs, and Old Minto. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding is possible along the low-lying areas and sloughs of the Tanana River. This could effect areas in the Minto Flats and near the Tanana River fire. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - High water levels on the Tanana River is expected to rise later this week with flooding possible. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - Please stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
